    Oakland California

    I lived in California from April of 2020 through June of 2023. I loved it. I didn't want to live anywhere else (until NYC). I lived downtown. I was captivated by the culture, people, politics, strength, beauty, and resilience of this town.

    Tags: Oakland, California, Cities
